Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Wolf of Wall Street' (2013), which of the following statements about the relationship between Jordan Belfort and Mark Hanna are true?
Options:
A. Jordan Belfort worked under Mark Hanna at L.F. Rothschild.
B. Mark Hanna was a mentor to Jordan Belfort.
C. Jordan Belfort became a stockbroker in 1985.
D. Mark Hanna introduced Jordan to the world of high finance.
Correct Answer: Jordan Belfort worked under Mark Hanna at L.F. Rothschild., Mark Hanna was a mentor to Jordan Belfort., Mark Hanna introduced Jordan to the world of high finance.
